item.title: Insurance Sales and Services
item.description:
About Us

Insurance Sales and Services offers a comprehensive range of insurance products including life insurance, annuities, critical illness coverage, and property insurance. Our expert team is dedicated to providing personalized solutions to meet your financial security and investment needs.

Our Services

  • Life Insurance: Comprehensive life insurance policies for financial security
  • Annuities: Long-term investment solutions for retirement planning
  • Critical Illness Coverage: Protection against major medical conditions and healthcare costs
  • Investments: Diverse investment options for wealth building
  • Property Insurance: Coverage for residential and commercial properties

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Kavita R Dabiedeen
  • Phone: 371-7779
  • Email: kavi112@gmail.com

item.title: Tucana Business Services Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

Tucana Business Services Ltd. offers comprehensive accounting, business consultancy, and taxation services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. With expertise in compliance and real estate, we provide strategic solutions that drive business success.

Our Services

  • Accounting Services: Full-service accounting and bookkeeping
  • Business Consultancy: Strategic planning and business advice
  • Taxation Services: Tax planning and compliance
  • Compliance Services: Regulatory compliance and reporting
  • Real Estate Services: Real estate consulting and advisory

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Kevin Leonce
  • Phone: +18683749747
  • Email: tucanabusinessservices@gmail.com
